name: City Builder/Editor Prototype
description:
A Prototype made  to learn Heaps Game Engine

Usage :

Select brush using icons at the top of the screen

Left Click to paint(once a brush is selected)

Use Trash buttonwith the same behaviour to delete objects

Right Click to move Camera;

Wheel to zoom 

Wheel Click to rotate Camera

Source code :  https://github.com/barraganlazlo/3D-CityBuilder
